mapper.content:
Critical Health Alert

Hi {{278.name}},

The automated health monitoring system has flagged a project you own as being In Trouble.

Please review the details below and take immediate action.

Project Details

Project: {{309.name}}
Assessed Health: In Trouble
Assessment Date: {{formatDate(now; "MMMM D, YYYY")}}

Key Factors from AI Analysis

Sentiment Alert(s): {{309.`DE:SentimentLabel`}}
AI Summary: "{{309.`DE:SentimentReasoning`}}"
Review Project Now

This is an automated message from the Project Health Monitoring System.
mapper.subject: CRITICAL HEALTH ALERT: Project "{{309.name}}" Flagged as In Trouble
